name: Open WebUI
author: open-webui
description: Open WebUI is an extensible, feature-rich, and user-friendly self-hosted WebUI designed to operate entirely offline. It supports various LLM runners, including Ollama and OpenAI-compatible APIs.

form_fields.label: Ollama API URL
form_fields.hint: If you want to use ollama please put the server URL here.

form_fields.label: OpenAI API key
form_fields.hint: If you want to use models like chatgpt please put your OpenAI key here.
